overview: Timothy Kinnear has over 22 years of experience in technology and emerging businesses. Prior to the merger of Airband and Sparkplug, Kinnear served as the CEO and CFO of Airband, responsible for all facets of Airbandâ€™s corporate strategy and operational finances, including relationships with investors, merger-and-acquisition activities, and banking relationships. Before joining Airband, Kinnear was the CFO at WiQuest Communications, where he raised $23 million from venture capital, negotiated agreements with strategic customers and partners, and led annual strategic planning and corporate development activities. Earlier in his career, Kinnear held executive and senior management positions at InnerWireless, Intrusion, Inc., and Cyrix Corporation, where he provided financial leadership for Cyrixâ€™s IPO.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelor of Business Administration and Accounting
